title: Border, 1600–50
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, discontinuous tape
dimensions:
H x W: 4.4 x 43.2 cm (1 3/4 x 17 in.)
Repeat: 3.8 cm (1 1/2 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Narrow band with a small, dense pattern of an inverted flower on a stem with curling leaves, which forms  a series of pendants.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1600–50.
1600–50. Medium: linen
